messages.subject: Unschooler on Oprah
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/26/02 6:09:42 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/26/02 6:09:42 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< ( What is on Oprah tomorrow? Rather, why are Mary and her daughter
going to be on? Unschooling on Oprah? >>

I wish it was on unschooling!! :)
Nah, it's about body image and self esteem and such. There is supposed to be
a two minute segment that they shot in Mary's home. So we'll get to meet her
up close and in person...sorta.
I wonder if homeschooling will even get mentioned? Don't forget to check out
the Oxygen channel for after the show stuff.

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
